name: 24h_blood_pressure_values
description: daytime, nighttime and total means of systolic and diastolic blood pressure values

steps.processorData:
SELECT w/data[at0001]/events[at1042]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value AS systolic_24h_mean,
       w/data[at0001]/events[at1042]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/value AS diastolic_24h_mean,
       w/data[at0001]/events[at0006,'24 hour daytime average']/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value AS systolic_day_mean,
       w/data[at0001]/events[at0006,'24 hour daytime average']/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/value AS diastolic_day_mean,
       w/data[at0001]/events[at0006,'24 hour nighttime average']/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value AS systolic_night_mean,
       w/data[at0001]/events[at0006,'24 hour nighttime average']/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/value AS diastolic_night_mean,
       c/context AS context, -- datetime when composition was created
       w/data[at0001]/events[at0006,'24 hour daytime average']/time/value AS measurement_date -- date when measurement was started
       -- e/ehr_id/value AS ehr_id,
FROM EHR e  
CONTAINS COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.encounter.v1]
CONTAINS OBSERVATION w[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.blood_pressure.v2] 
WHERE e/ehr_id/value = :ehrId -- test ehr_id: 5066c8b2-2c0b-4a84-83c1-fbf193ea9a75
ORDER BY measurement_date DESC 
OFFSET 0  
LIMIT 5
